about_the_game: Check out our FREE GAME DEMO to get a taste of the story, try out a few high-tech upgrades, and test your puzzle-solving skills in three unique levels!
detailed_description: Check out our FREE GAME DEMO to get a taste of the story, try out a few high-tech upgrades, and test your puzzle-solving skills in three unique levels!
name: Bricking Bots Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+), Windows 10 and Windows 11
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

short_description: Play as a brave little robot in a Retro 3D Collectathon! Solve room-sized physics puzzles, blast villains with your laser, and help your fellow workers rise against your tyrannical BOSS. The more bots you break, the easier each puzzle gets!
